on reading compounds: 拗音【ヨウオン】contracted sound, palatalised sound (e.g. Japanese morae with small kana)
kun reading compounds: 捩れる【ねじれる】to get twisted, to get crooked, to get warped, to become twisted (of a mind, relationship, etc.), to become warped, to become perverse, to become contrary, to become troubled, to become complicated, to become strained
拗れる【こじれる】to get complicated, to grow worse, to turn sour
拗ねる【すねる】to be peevish, to sulk, to pout
拗ける【ねじける】to curve, to twist, to be rebellious
